message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate, right?
You're being too generous, I'll take 60%
You think you can take 60%? I'll give you a chance to reconsider!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away the farm!
I'll take 65%, it's a fair deal
65%? You're getting greedy! I'll give you a chance to reconsider, but don't expect me to give away more than 45%!
I'm being generous, considering the inflation. Take it or leave it!
I'll take 68%, you're getting a bit desperate
You think I'm desperate? I'll give you a chance to reconsider, but I'm not going to give away more than 42%!
I'm being realistic, considering the inflation. Take it or leave it, but I'm not going to give away more than 38%!
I'll take 72%, you're running out of time
You're pushing your luck, Bob! I'll give you a chance to reconsider, but I'm not going to give away more than 32%!
I'm running out of time and options. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'll take 78%, you're really running out of options now
Fine, have it your way. But I'm not going to give away more than 25%!
This is my last stand. I'll give you a decent deal, but I'm not going to give away more than 29%!
I'll take 82%, you're out of time, I'm taking control
Fine, you win. I'll take nothing. Congratulations, Bob.
